input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_ARS_System, HP_ServiceCenter,BMC_Remedyforce, ServiceNow

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The change concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.
Note : For Remedyforce its associates Change and Incident only
Sample xml for Remdyforce <Changes> <Change> <entry1-request-id>CR00000079</entry1-request-id> <entry2-request-id>00000067</entry2-request-id> </Change> </Changes>

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The task concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure.
String Value - A process specific explanation for the value of success status.

call-process.process-name: :AutoPilot-OA-Change_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values for Single Change

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">add-screlation</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys> <source> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//entry1-form-name/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </source> <source-filename> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">cm3r</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </source-filename> <depend-filename> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">problem</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </depend-filename> <depend> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//entry2-form-name/text()" /> </value> </depend> </keys> <instance> <source> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//entry1-request-id/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </source> <source-filename> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">cm3r</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </source-filename> <depend-filename> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">problem</xsl:text> </value> <type> <xsl:text>String</xsl:text> </type> </depend-filename> <depend> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//entry2-request-id/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </depend> </instance> </model> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="//item/metadata/status" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create change association because of the following: ", .)
concat("Unable to create change because of the following: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""failure"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create change because of the following: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <change> <success-status> <xsl:value-of select=""failure"" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </success-status> <status-message> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </status-message> </change> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will create a change association.
